attributes.action: STOP the IHT raid on private pension funds. Government need to rethink quickly.
attributes.additional_details: To reconsider the Budget  statement  and offer a more Equitable  arrangement a fairer tax regime  regarding  IHT. The farmers  have had much publicity. Equally unfair  is IHT of private  pension savings    Being able to leave money  to dependents is threatened  with 40% IHT on estate probate over the threshold already limited  to £325k. This is particularly difficult  for older pension  savers  now distressed  that by saving they're not going to leave monies as intended. Cancel  or adjust.
attributes.background:
The Chancellor  announced  IHT will be added to pension  savings after 2027 in the budget. 
This will increase the number of households falling into this Tax on death. After years  of saving  for retirement  and encouraged to do so by previous  Government tax relief.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700306
